alert.note: Alert for Robertson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 30 at 8:24PM CDT until June 30 at 11:00PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN DAVIDSON...SOUTHERN SUMNER...NORTHWESTERN WILSON AND SOUTHEASTERN ROBERTSON COUNTIES... At 824 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hendersonville, or near Gallatin, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Gallatin, Lebanon, Springfield, Madison, Hendersonville, Mount Juliet, Goodlettsville, White House, Millersville, Greenbrier, Lakewood, Ridgetop, Hermitage, Old Hickory, Green Hill, Bledsoe Creek State Park and Cottontown. This includes Interstate 65 between mile markers 92 and 108. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
